name: Sequence Hat
description:
## Sequence Hat

Introducing the ultimate collectible hat for all crypto enthusiasts and bumpkins alike, created in collaboration with Sequence, a leading crypto wallet provider. Available through special events.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
[Bumpkins](https://docs.bumpkins.io/getting-started/about)
[Bumpkins Terms and Conditions](https://docs.bumpkins.io/support/terms-of-service)
[Sunflower Land](https://docs.sunflower-land.com/getting-started/about)
